bug.description:
Title says it all. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run this script: import streamlit as st import plotly.express as px
iris = px.data.iris() fig = px.scatter( iris, x='sepal_length', y='sepal_width', ) st.plotly_chart(fig)
st.header('Header') <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
The header should appear below the x axis label <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/225715/66663826-4e2c4980-ec43-11e9-99db-2c139b1f1b2b.png></denchmark-link>
